translations: v．消灭，根除：彻底消除或摧毁某物或某群体。

sentences.sentence: When experimental populations are set up under simple laboratory conditions, the predator often exterminates its prey and then becomes extinct itself, having nothing left to eat.
sentences.translation: 当实验种群在简单的实验室条件下建立起来时，捕食者往往会消灭它的猎物，然后自己也走向灭绝，因为没有东西可以吃。
